data-definition:
-- BUILDING COMPONENT ITEM SELECTION
When creating a building, one record per required item type. E.g. Soap Maker's workshop requires a bucket and a building material.
One choice in the build item selector.
(let* ((selector $global.buildreq) (req $selector.requirements[$selector.req_index])) $req.candidates[$])
(let* ((selector $global.buildreq) (req $selector.requirements[$selector.req_index])) $req.candidates[$])
dtor: 0x85272c0

needs to be a separate type so that widget_tabs can forward-declare this type as a friend
contains a word and punctuation?
related to string length? horizontal offset? vertical offset? R = 0x1, B = 0x2, P = 0x4 (parsed tokens)
